title: [1.8][ssp/smp]More Metals更多金属
author: 小胡子大叔
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小胡子大叔 于 2015-12-19 19:57 编辑 

刚刚在逛curse mc 看见这个mod
觉得不错就过来与大家分享

先来看作者原话
Ever thought the world of Minecraft didn't have enough metals? This mod is for you then... This mod adds 2 new metals, Azure and Etryx, with 15 more metals planned. Will you be able to get all of the metals? Only one way to find out...  Crafting Recipes on Images tab  Thank you for all of the support on this mod. I uploaded this mod to CurseForge thinking that maybe a few people might try it, but I never thought it would be somewhat popular. You all are awesome! :D  I am sorry to say this, but due to school finals and Christmas, I will not be able to work on updating the mode for a couple weeks, but when I come back, I will come back strong. I plan on releasing 2 new metals in the next update. I already made the textures for them, so they should go pretty quick. I am also planning on some surprises in the next update, so make sure to look for those. Some of them will be obvious while others not so much...  This mod was made using MCreator - Click here to go to their website.  Don't Forget To Be Awesome -Spaceguy230
